document.discussion_title: 35-year-old man from Newport 'violently assaulted' on Sunday night
document.topic_text: 35-year-old man from Newport 'violently assaulted' on Sunday night ASSAULT: Police are investigating a violent assault in Newport on Sunday night Share: A 35-YEAR-OLD man from Newport was violently assaulted on Sunday. The incident took place on Sycamore Avenue in Somerton at around 7.30pm. Gwent Police are treating this as an isolated incident and enquiries are ongoing. Anyone with information is asked to call the police on 101 and quote log number 499 24/4/16. Share:
